layout.singingstanza: There are times and times a -- gain, When my love seems far a -- way; The ho -- urs would stretch, the days turn gray; All the while, I know not how, In my dark -- est hour, He prays In the saints, oh, for my sake. By a touch of His dear love, By the sound of His sweet voice, Whis -- pers from a -- bove, Spo -- ken through men of clay. And this world just fades a -- way. (Let this world just fade a -- way.)

lyrics.stanza: By a touch of His dear love, By the sound of His sweet voice, Whispers from above, Spoken through men of clay. And this world just fades away. (Let this world just fade away.)
